prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Promptbook is suitable for complex AI-generated content creation, separating code from text prompts, orchestrating multiple prompts, and versioning prompts. It may not be ideal for simple, single-prompt applications or when OpenAI Assistant (GPTs) is sufficient.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
